basic.description: This course examines Spanish poetic production during the twentieth century, with special attention given to the aesthetic transformations during the three historical/political moments that best characterize this period: the Republic, Franco¿s dictatorship, and democracy. Authors belonging to the "Generación del 27,"  the "Poesía del exilio," and the "Poesía de la experiencia" will be studied among others.
basic.subject: SPAN
basic.title: 20thc.Spanish Peninsular Poetr
